name: Miner Maxine
description:
Maxine is a laid-off miner taking care of an animal sanctuary in West Texas. She is helped by her best doggie friend, Borker. But one day when enjoying the sunset, a new foe appears from the ground and captures Borker! It is the strange and dastardly worm people that are responsible. Now Maxine must rush to rescue her friend from an uncertain fate.

What is it the worm people want?

- Collect gems as buff powerups

- Choose between five different weapons

- Use six different items for crowd control

- Beat nine Levels with three bosses

- Spend your gold on bonus games: Slots, Crane games and General Stores

Your objective is to find the exit at the end of each level, then defeat the wormlie officers and save Borker! Good luck.

- Weapons -

        - Shovel - The second weakest, but second fastest weapon. Very helpful for collecting items and gems. Destroys sand and dirt.

        - Pickaxe - The second strongest, but second slowest weapon. Very helpful for combat. Destroys stone.         - Harpoon - A middle weapon for strength and speed. Use them to bounce to higher ground and strike enemies from a distance. Cannot dig.

        - Hookshot - The fastest, but weakest weapon. Use it to get around quickly and access hard-to-reach loot. Cannot dig.

        - Drill - The strongest, but slowest weapon. Used to annihilate enemies and destroy all kinds of blocks.

- Gemstones -

        - Turquoise - Reveals hidden blocks and loot. Drains over time.

        - Silver - Draws all loot on screen towards you.

        - Ruby - Doubles the damage from weapons. Allows you to stop and pick up boulders.

        - Sapphire - Doubles the attack rate of weapons. Increases movement speed.

        - Emerald - Provides shielding from attacks, Essentially hit-points.

- Items - 

        - French Fries - Irresistible to wormlies. Drop near enemies as a decoy. OR give to friendly wormlie workers for rewards.

        - Banana - Place on ground to hurt passing enemies, or hit them directly for extra damage.

        - Onion - Wormlies hate the smell of onions and will avoid them at all costs.

        - Clock - Smash these into walls to put enemies to sleep for 30 seconds, OR hit them directly for an extra 20 seconds.

        - Scateboard - Roll these into multiple enemies in a line to wipe 'em all out.

        - Anvil - Drop these from a good distance and watch as they bounce around destroying wormlies.

Supports gamepad and keyboard controls.

Keyboard controls: Arrow keys to move, Enter is start, space is jump, Z is attack, C is interact, X is use item, A and S or D and F to toggle items.

-*-*-*-*-*  SNEAK PEAK AT OUR NEXT GAME  *-*-*-*-*-

- Miles the Marshmallow Man -

A grid-based action game in the vein of classic Bomberman. Scoop up Goopers with your ladle and toss them at enemies or other players. Watch as the goop bounces off walls and crashes into opponents.

        Miles will be waiting for you!
